question: India won __________ medals at the 5th International Sven Lange Memorial Tournament in Germany.
explanation: Indian junior boxers won 6 gold, 4 silver and 1 bronze medal and finished as overall champions at the fifth International Sven Lange Memorial Tournament, Schwerin, Germany. The Indian team won the 'Best Team' of the tournament award. Also, Bhavesh Kattamani (52kg) who won a gold medal, was awarded the 'best boxer trophy'.
